section.heading: Application of chapter to nonresident subject to personal jurisdiction.

annoGroup.heading: Effective Dates
annoGroup.annotation: Applicability: Section 3 of D.C. Law 16-137 provided: “This act shall apply as of April 1, 2007.”

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 210 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (2001 Act).
